install.name: prettySlider
install.author: Joomla Bamboo
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 Joomla Bamboo. All rights reserved.
install.description: Pretty Slider Gallery is a Joomla module that will have your images sliding and fading in no time. It is coupled with the prettyPhoto overlay and the image resize script from Shifting Pixel so the module is able to resize your images on the fly and disply the original in an elegant lightbox. Setting up the gallery is as simple as designating a folder where the images should be pulled from and the module will do the rest.

param.name: module_id
param.label: Module ID
param.description: Unique ID for this PrettySlider Module

param.name: directory
param.label: Image Directory
param.description: Directory images will be sourced from - this is the relative directory eg images/stories.

param.name: link
param.label: Link Behaviour
param.description: Choose the action that occurs when an image is clicked. See the demo site for instrtuctions related to the content item and blog category options.
param.option: Opens image in the same window
Opens the image in a new window

param.name: prettyPhoto
param.label: Enable prettyphoto?
param.description: Enable this option if you want to display image when clicked in a prettyPhoto overlay. If you are using another module that includes prettyPhoto then set this option to no.

param.name: prettyPhotoScripts
param.label: Load prettyphoto scripts?
param.description: Enable this option if you want to load the js and css scripts for prettyphoto. Disable it if these are being loaded by another module.

param.name: theme
param.label: Overlay Theme
param.description: Select the theme to use in the lightbox.

param.name: opacity
param.label: Overlay opacity
param.description: Set the opacity of the overlay - 1 is opaque and 0 is transparent.

param.name: padding
param.label: prettyPhoto padding
param.description: The width of the padding around the prettyPhoto overlay without px.

param.name: resize
param.label: Resize Image?
param.description: Set this option to true if you want to be able to resize large images that are automatically scaled down to fit within the browser window.

param.name: prettyBoxTitle
param.label: Show image title?
param.description: Display the title of the image in the overlay?

param.name: prettyBoxSpeed
param.label: Overlay Speed
param.description: The speed at which the overlay appears when the image is displayed in the lightbox.

param.name: img_width
param.label: Image Width
param.description: The width that the image is cropped to. No need to use px just the pixel value.

param.name: img_height
param.label: Image Height
param.description: The height that the image is cropped to. No need to use px just the pixel value.

param.name: crop_width
param.label: Crop ratio width
param.description: The width ratio that the image is cropped by

param.name: crop_height
param.label: Crop ratio height
param.description: The height ratio that the image is cropped by

param.name: transition
param.label: Type of the transition
param.description: Seelect the speed in which the transition should occur.

param.name: speed
param.label: Speed of the transition
param.description: Select the speed in which the transition should occur.

param.name: time
param.label: Display Time
param.description: Select the time in ms that an image should be visible before the transition occurs.

param.name: ssnav
param.label: Display the navigation buttons?
param.description: Select whether to display the next and previous buttons.

param.name: sspag
param.label: Display the slideshow pagination?
param.description: Select whether to display the pagination for the slideshow.

param.name: navStyle
param.label: Button theme
param.description: Select the theme for the next and previous buttons.

param.name: navTop
param.label: Top offset for the pagination
param.description: The top offset for the pagination in px.

param.name: navLeft
param.label: Left offset for the pagination
param.description: The left offset for the pagination in px.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
